title: "What is somnambulism and how is it manifested? What are the different degrees and types of magnetic sleep?"
first_phrase: In this text, the author delves into the different types of somnambulism, from the spiritual to the material. They explore the various degrees of sleep and the conditions that lead to a deeper state of consciousness. The text explains why some somnambulists have their eyes turned upwards while others have them downwards, and the differences in the movements of the two types. The author also answers questions about the nature of somnambulism, including its causes and manifestations. Overall, the text provides valuable insights into the workings of the human mind during sleep.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the various states of sleep and their differences can aid in better management of our spiritual and physical health.
